snippet: Stocks closed lower after President Barack Obama insisted that higher tax payments from wealthy Americans would have to be part of any budget deal.
abstract: Stocks close lower after Pres Obama insists that higher tax payments from wealthy Americans would have to be part of any budget deal.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed lower after President Barack Obama insisted that higher tax payments from wealthy Americans would have to be part of any budget deal.

headline.seo: Shares Decline More Sharply After Tax Remarks
headline.main: Shares Fall After Obama’s Tax Remarks
